titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Swaziland
Swaziland

div.head: Legislation
div.p: The Archives Act of 1971 created the National Archives of Swaziland. Currently records available for research were created between 1947 and 1969, but there is a de facto rule that documents become accessible 30 years after creation.

div.head: Location
div.p: National Archives, Parliament Road, LOBAMBA, PO Box 946, MBABANE.
Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade, PO Box 518, MBABANE.

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers should contact both the National Archives and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs to inquire about the feasibility of accessing relevant records.

p.ref: Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade
